definition.content:
There are **4 sections** in this dashboard, all require Cloud Cost Management for OpenAI to be set up to see data.

1. **OpenAI Cost Management**: [Set up](https://docs.datadoghq.com/cloud_cost_management/saas_costs/?tab=openai#setup) Cloud Cost Management and then the OpenAI integration
2.  **OpenAI Integration (API)**: [Set up](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai/?tab=apikey) the **free** API set-up portion
3. **OpenAI Integration (APM)**: [Set up](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai/?tab=python) APM and the APM section of the Datadog OpenAI Integration 
4. **LLM Observability**: [Set up](https://docs.datadoghq.com/llm_observability/setup/?tab=decorators) LLM Observability 

You can clone and customize this dashboard for your specific tags
Set up the Cloud Cost Management [OpenAI Cost Integration](https://docs.datadoghq.com/cloud_cost_management/saas_costs/?tab=openai#setup)   to see data in this section.

OpenAI models have different capabilities and price points, and are priced by the **number of input and output tokens**.

In Cloud Cost Management, costs are broken down by the **input and output costs per model**.

definition.title: Cost Changes Over Time by ServiceName

definition.content: Set up the **free** [API part](https://app.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai?search=OpenAI)  of the [OpenAI general integration](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai/?tab=python) to see data in this section. Dive deeper in [OpenAI Usage Overview](https://app.datadoghq.com/dash/integration/31040/openai-usage-overview).

queries.name: query2
queries.query: sum:custom.cost.amortized{provider_name:OpenAI AND (servicename:*GPT*) AND $api_key AND $ml_app AND $service AND $model AND $project}

definition.content: Set up the [APM](https://app.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai?search=OpenAI) part of [OpenAI general integration](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai/?tab=python) to see data in this section. You must be an APM customer to set up. Dive deeper in [OpenAI Overview Dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/dash/integration/30978/openai-overview-dashboard).

Please [set up](https://docs.datadoghq.com/llm_observability/) LLM Observability to see data in this section. With [LLM Observability](https://app.datadoghq.com/llm/traces), you can monitor, troubleshoot, and evaluate your LLM-powered applications.

definition.title: Cost per ML App Over Time
